# Other possibilities {-}

With R Markdown (and RStudio), you are also able to do:

* [Books](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/) (package `bookdown`):
  This document was created with this package;

* [Blogs](https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/) (package `blogdown`);

* [Connect](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200532077-Version-Control-with-Git-and-SVN)
  directly with Git (and SVN) and GitHub.
